articles.title: Heart attack plus cardiac arrest survivors at higher risk of early death
articles.description: A heart attack is when blood flow to the heart is blocked, and sudden cardiac arrest is when the heart malfunctions and suddenly stops beating unexpectedly. Cardiac arrest can be fatal if not treated immediately. | Health
